title: Bug 17703 - Edit/Add Task action should use Workbench dialog as Java Editor does
OB: When selecting a compilation unit (CU) in the packages view and executing the 'File -> Add Task' action, a different dialog is displayed compared to executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
SR: The 'File -> Add Task' action should use the same dialog in the Workbench as the Java editor's ruler context menu.
